General.Name: Yao I Fabric Co Ltd
General.Description: Yao I Fabric Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of fiber products in Taiwan. It offers various fishing, tennis, badminton racket, and cutting lines; industrial wires, monofilament, tech textile, pet mats, breathable beds, knitted cotton car seats, car seats with blankets, and automotive sound-absorbing cotton materials; and environmentally friendly stretch cotton, firewood, stretch cotton, and electronic supplies blankets, as well as shoes with cotton insulation class, and bedding and sofa with a stretch cotton. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Changhua, Taiwan.
